channel.title: scene on Christian Tan
channel.description: Recent content in scene on Christian Tan

item.title: Project 1: The Cyclistic Case Study
item.description: Mission Statement: The bike sharing company wants to analyze their users’ data to find the main differences between two certain types of users, the “casual” who pays for each ride and the “annual” member who pays a yearly subscription for the service. Part 1: Ask Key Objectives: Identify the business task: Cyclistic wants to improve their earnings reaching out to their “casual” riders, and for that they have to analyze the different aspects of the “casual” and the annual customers.

item.title: Project 2: The NBA 3-Point Revolution
item.description: Table of Contents Project Description Data Preparation and Exploration 2.1 Data information 2.2 Brief Exploration 2.3 Data Transformations Modeling 3.1 Bar Chart 3.2 Plot Chart 3.3 Density Plot Chart 3.4 Significant/Insignificant Coefficients 3.5 Predictive Performance 3.6 Accuracy, Recall, Precision Results and Discussion Conclusion 1. Project Description Conventionally, in the sport of basketball there are defined player positions with standard body profiles.
